*Project DEFY!*
Two exciting roles are open for those who believe in redefining education:

1. The Subject Matter Expert in Self-Designed Learning (SME-SDL) at the Chief Minister's Youth Centre (CMYC). Collaborating with the Sauramandala Foundation and the Government of Meghalaya.

2. The second open role is the Community Fellow at Sathanur Nook in Bangalore, ideal for individuals passionate about leading innovative learning spaces.

Come and be part of a global movement that’s redefining education, empowering learners, and solving real-world challenges. If you’re excited to innovate and support meaningful learning experiences, we want to hear from you!

Apply now - https://bit.ly/3pb8JVs
JD for Subject Matter Expert - https://bit.ly/3EYBUCW
JD for Nook Fellow - https://bit.ly/41gLA3m
